entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening and ending late this evening then 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
